quest.name: Ys Iala's Errand
journal: Ys Iala hungers for your assistance.
objectives: Deliver the bellfruits to Ys Iala.

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Unnngh... I'm so hungry I may faint...

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Fruit─a little fruit will set me aright... Will you go and fetch some for me?

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Just outside the village, you'll find a hillock. Two great belltrees grow there. If you give them a shake, they should render up their sweet, succulent burdens.

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: The trees grow on the nearby hillock. Please hurry and fetch me their fruit─I'm liable to faint at any moment now...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A bug comes tumbling down with the fruit!

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Unnngh... So hungry... Did you get the fruit?

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you ever so much... You've saved me, hehehe...

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Yes, saved me from my boredom! You should have seen the look on your face when the bugs came down! Tee hee hee!

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Ahhh, you've done me a great service, mortal. If there's one thing we pixies are serious about, it's having fun!

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: Dull and painful things? Hate, hate, hate them! Sin eaters are dull and painful both, so we hate them especially!

dialogue.name: YSIALA
dialogue.text: You mortals try to fight those monstrosities, but there's no fun in that. Best to avoid them altogether, we say!
